response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand its worth stands at $15,000. My goal is to maximize the return on this valuable asset while ensuring it finds a home where it can truly make a difference. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a substantial saving compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing how this product could benefit you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 12000}
